text: Hi :wave::skin-tone-2:.  I’m <@U0190968M6H>, Senior Product Designer of CMS Developer Experience at HubSpot. I am working with <@U0163CK2J20> who is also on the DevEx team and we are hoping to get some feedback on serverless functions.  If you’re holding back from using this feature, could you drop a quick note in the thread below and tell us why in a few sentences? Thanks! :pray::skin-tone-2:

• Execution limits (also, unclear from <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions#know-your-limits|docs> if the limit is _60 function executions per minute_ or more because next bullet uses _600 function executions that complete in 1 second could run_ as an example)
• Geographical location - our compliance was very strict that even with the privacy shield we cannot submit customer data to US
• Existing Google Cloud infrastructure where we can handle the data easier than from AWS
• Apparently not possible the use scheduled functions (we need to sync data from external source to HubDB)
